channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: UK weather: Britain forecast horror mega storm with 9 days worth of rain in just three HOURS
item.description: Intense downpours will hit a large chunk of the country in just days, according to forecasts by weather service Ventusky - with nine days worth of rai...

item.title: Today's horoscope for April 12 as Capricorn is urged to steer clear of arguments
item.description: Today's horoscope for April 12 will see Taurus keep an eye on someone, while Sagittarius should consider their words carefully

item.title: Texas plane crash: At least one person killed after latest horror aircraft smash near airport
item.description: Emergency services have descended on Propwash Airport, which is in Justin, Texas, as a plane has crashed - after the pilot reportedly experienced an i...

item.title: Mum of two found dead in shower - before love rat husband’s crime exposed
item.description: Stacy Feldman challenged her husband after his mistress got in touch with her – but she could not have imagined how he would react, with devastating c...

item.title: Doctor says one food 'worse than smoking' and biggest cause of 'early death'
item.description: Dr Chris van Tulleken said some foods are as addictive as tobacco, alcohol and gambling

item.title: Receipt artist creates supermarket bills with A to Z of items and a Trump prank
item.description: You cannot guess what he used for Z.

item.title: Man plans to use World War II bomb found in his garden as beer cooler
item.description: The bomb's discovery lead to Ross' street being shut with an explosive ordnance disposal unit ensured the device was safe.

item.title: Woman paralysed from neck down after weight loss surgery in Turkey
item.description: Danielle Peebles started getting complications from her surgery shortly after she returned from Turkey.

item.title: Student so scared of DIY he paid tradesman £180 to change batteries
item.description: Sam Daley also says he doesn’t want to speak to anyone on the phone and he lacks the confidence to negotiate so sourced the tradesman through an app.

item.title: Nine English words you probably didn’t know came from Irish
item.description: Some common words we use every day, including the name of one of the UK's main political parties, have a surprising origin in Irish.
